Field.Name: Name
Field.Caption: Name
Field.HelpDefault: The field name used by the database

Field.Name: Active
Field.Caption: Active
Field.HelpDefault: Determines if this record is available to the system. An inactive record will not be displayed on the public site, and will not be available in lists of records. You can however, edit the record from the admin site.

Field.Name: Caption
Field.Caption: Caption
Field.HelpDefault: The caption displayed on all editing forms

Field.Name: ReadOnly
Field.Caption: Read Only
Field.HelpDefault: Read only field

Field.Name: NotEditable
Field.Caption: Write Once
Field.HelpDefault: Only editable when the record is added. Then read-only.

Field.Name: LookupContentID
Field.Caption: Lookup Content
Field.HelpDefault: For field type Lookup, the field will store the ID for this content, and this content will populate the lookup for the editor.

Field.Name: RedirectContentID
Field.Caption: Redirect Content
Field.HelpDefault: For Redirect type fields. For this field, the edit page will include a link to this Redirect Content. When clicked, this content will be opened to all records where the Redirect ID-Fieldname equals the ID for this record.

Field.Name: RedirectID
Field.Caption: Redirect ID-FieldName
Field.HelpDefault: See the Redirect Content explanation.

Field.Name: UniqueName
Field.Caption: Unique
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, this value in this field must be unique across all records.

Field.Name: DefaultValue
Field.Caption: Default Value
Field.HelpDefault: When a new record is created in the admin site, or using the programmatic ContentSet system, this value will be used as the initial value.

Field.Name: Required
Field.Caption: Required
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, this field can not be saved blank

Field.Name: Password
Field.Caption: Password
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, this field will use the html password field.

Field.Name: Scramble
Field.Caption: Scramble Data in Database
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, this value will be not be saved in plain text. It will be scrambled in the database.

Field.Name: HTMLContent
Field.Caption: Edit as Html, not Wysiwyg
Field.HelpDefault: For Html fields. When checked, the default editor should be a text box and not a wysiwyg editor.

Field.Name: IndexColumn
Field.Caption: Admin Listing Column
Field.HelpDefault: In the admin listing page, the column for this field, 0 based started on the left.

Field.Name: IndexWidth
Field.Caption: Admin Listing Width
Field.HelpDefault: A numeric value used to calculate the width of the fields column. If 0, the column is not listed.

Field.Name: Authorable
Field.Caption: Admin Authorable
Field.HelpDefault: When not checked, this field will not appear in the admin edit page.

Field.Name: IndexSortPriority
Field.Caption: Admin Listing Sort Priority
Field.HelpDefault: A numeric value used to determine the default sort column.

Field.Name: IndexSortDirection
Field.Caption: Admin Listing Sort Direction
Field.HelpDefault: If the current sort field, this determines the sort direction.

Field.Name: EditSortPriority
Field.Caption: Admin Edit Sort Priority
Field.HelpDefault: The order in which fields appear in the admin edit screen. A numeric sort for all fields in this content definition.

Field.Name: EditTab
Field.Caption: Admin Edit Tab
Field.HelpDefault: The text name used for the admin editing tab

Field.Name: AdminOnly
Field.Caption: Administrator Only
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, content managers can not see this field, only administrators and developers.

Field.Name: DeveloperOnly
Field.Caption: Developer Only
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, administrators can not see this field, only developers.

Field.Name: ManyToManyContentID
Field.Caption: Many-To-Many Content
Field.HelpDefault: For Many-To-Many fields. This is the other content to which this record is associated.

Field.Name: ManyToManyRuleContentID
Field.Caption: Many-To-Many Rule Content
Field.HelpDefault: For Many-To-Many fields. Select the Rule content created for this relationship. It should have a field for the ID of this record, and a field for the ID of the record in the Many-to-Many content.

Field.Name: ManyToManyRulePrimaryField
Field.Caption: Many-To-Many Rule Primary Field
Field.HelpDefault: The name of the field in the Rule content that holds the ID for this record.

Field.Name: ManyToManyRuleSecondaryField
Field.Caption: Many-To-Many Rule Secondary Field
Field.HelpDefault: The name of the field in the Rule content that holds the ID for the secondary content (selected as the Many-To-Many Content above)

Field.Name: MemberSelectGroupID
Field.Caption: Member Select Group
Field.HelpDefault: For Member Select types, this is the group which holds all the people for the select list.

Field.Name: LookupList
Field.Caption: Lookup List
Field.HelpDefault: for field type lookup, when no Lookup Content is selected, this is a comma delimited list of strings used for the editor selection. A numeric value will be stored in the field representing the item order starting with 1.

Field.Name: editorAddonID
Field.Caption: Editor for this Field
Field.HelpDefault: An addon used to edit the data from this field in the admin editor. When set to none, the admin site will use the default editor for the field type.

Field.Name: InstalledByCollectionID
Field.Caption: Installed By Collection
Field.HelpDefault: The addon collection that installed this field.

Field.Name: createResourceFilesOnRoot
Field.Caption: Create Resource Files On Root
Field.HelpDefault: Only for field types that require files. When checked, new files will be created in the website root folder and begin with a / character. When not checked, new files will be created in the virtual files folder and will not begin with a /.

Field.Name: prefixForRootResourceFiles
Field.Caption: Prefix For Root Resource Files
Field.HelpDefault: Only for field types that require files. When 'Create Resource Files On Root' is checked, this prefix will be used for the new files. It must begin with a forward slash (/).

Field.Name: TriggerConditionID
Field.Caption: Condition
Field.LookupList: Always,If Visitor is in Condition Group,If Visitor is not in Condition Group

Field.Name: AllowChildListDisplay
Field.Caption: Display Child Pages for This Page

Field.Name: MenuHeadline
Field.Caption: Menu and Child Page Headline for This Page

Field.Name: AllowBrief
Field.Caption: Display Child Page Overview for This Page

Field.Name: BriefFilename
Field.Caption: Child Page Overview for This Page

Field.Name: ConditionID
Field.Caption: Condition
Field.LookupList: Condition period (days) before expiration from Condition Groups,Condition period (days) after joining Condition Groups,On the birthday of Condition Group members

Field.Name: EmailTypeID
Field.Caption: Email Type
Field.LookupList: Conditional Birthday,Conditional After Join,Conditional Before Expiration,System,Group

Field.Name: fieldTypeEditor
Field.Caption: Use as Editor for Field Types

Field.Name: TypeID
Field.Caption: Type
Field.LookupList: Normal,Forward to URL,Forward to Replacement Domain

Addon.name: Child Page List
Contensive Base Javascript
Contensive Base Styles
Page Manager
Login Form
Addon.Help: This is more complete instructions. This appears in the help bubble.

record.name: By Alpha Sort Order Then Oldest First
